title: Change Artist Leaderboard page background to light blue

requirements.text: Update the Artist Leaderboard page background to be light blue instead of the current dark/coffee-toned background.
acceptanceCriteria: When viewing the Artist Leaderboard page, the primary page background renders as a light blue color.
The background color change is applied via the existing theme/CSS variable approach (so it affects the `mandala-bg` container and the `body` background consistently).

requirements.text: Ensure the Artist Leaderboard page remains readable and visually consistent after switching the background to light blue (including text colors, card contrast, and the mandala/paper texture overlay layers).
acceptanceCriteria: All page text (header, subheader, footer, and leaderboard row content) maintains sufficient contrast against the new light blue background.
The mandala pattern and paper texture overlays remain subtle and do not reduce readability on the light blue background.
Glassmorphism cards/rows remain visually separated from the light blue background (no washed-out blending).

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only).
Do not modify frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, or frontend/src/main.tsx (immutable paths).
Backend must remain single-actor; no backend changes are required for this request.
nonGoals: Do not change leaderboard data, ranking logic, or add new leaderboard features.
Do not add or change authentication behavior.
Do not introduce new pages or routing changes.
